src:
Tanamkan Ciri Khas Persebaya, Aji Santoso Ajak Aryn Williams Berdiskusi
04 Nov 2019, 22:08 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pelatih Persebaya Surabaya, Aji Santoso mulai rajin berdiskusi dengan pemainnya. Setelah sebelumnya Irfan Jaya, kini Aryn Williams yang diajak berbicara empat mata oleh arsitek asal Kepanjen, Kabupaten Malang itu.
Aji yang cukup fasih berbahasa inggris mengajak ngobrol gelandang asal Australia tersebut sebelum latihan dimulai. Sepertinya, keduanya mendiskusikan hal-hal yang berhubungan dengan permainan.
"Saya sampaikan saja saya selalu tanamkan selain secara tim saya selalu berbicara secara individu memberi pemahaman kepada pemain," kata Aji Santoso membocorkan apa yang dibahas dengan Aryn Williams.
"Karena bagaimanapun, sehebat apapun pemain ada sisi yang tidak terlihat oleh pemain, itulah pelatih yang tahu. Saya sampaikan, supaya benar-benar dia memahami karakter yang saya inginkan," tegasnya.
Persebaya berlatih di Stadion Gelora Delta, Sidoarjo, Senin (4/11/2019) sore. Mereka mempersiapkan diri untuk menghadapi Tira Persikabo dalam lanjutan Shopee Liga 1 2019 yang disiarkan Indosiar, Sabtu (9/11/2019).

Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters.
text:
Cultivating Persebaya's Characteristics, Aji Santoso Invites Aryn Williams to Discuss
Nov 04 2019, 22:08 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persebaya Surabaya coach, Aji Santoso began diligently discussing with his players. After previously Irfan Jaya, now Aryn Williams was invited to speak privately by an architect from Kepanjen, Malang Regency.
Aji, who is fluent in English, invited the Australian midfielder to chat before training began. Apparently, the two discussed matters relating to the game.
"I just say I always instill in addition to the team I always talk individually giving understanding to the players," said Aji Santoso divulging what was discussed with Aryn Williams.
"Because after all, as great as any player there is a side that is not visible to players, that's the coach who knows. I say, so he really understands the character that I want," he said.
Persebaya trained at the Delta Gelora Stadium, Sidoarjo, Monday (11/04/2019) afternoon. They prepare themselves to face Tira Persikabo in the continuation of Shopee Liga 1 2019, which is broadcast by Indosiar, Saturday (11/09/2019).

Scroll down for more information, Bolaneters.
